hero.title: Ignacio Figueroa
hero.description: Software Developer with a strong focus in the Frontend side Delivering High-Quality Solutions for Enhanced User Experiences.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description: I've been diving into the web ecosystem on my own for nearly three years now focusing on the Frontend Development, soaking up everything I can about crafting awesome user interfaces. Always hungry to learn and stay on top of the latest web tech!

places.description: At Pawtrics Software LLC, My main role was specialize in frontend development using Next.js and MUI. I focus on optimizing code structure and enhancing user experience to create intuitive interfaces.

myRecomendations.name: Manuel Zarraga
myRecomendations.description: Working with Ignacio has been a great experience from day one. He is a very complete developer, with a great emphasis on details and a great ability to solve problems that may arise. He is also a very good coworker, always helping others, either by taking the time to explain concepts that you do not understand or by contributing his vision to the ideas that are being developed.

myRecomendations.name: Pia Walcott
myRecomendations.description: In the time I've known Ignacio, he's transformed into an outstanding developer. He's not one to settle for mediocrity; instead, he consistently pushes himself to exceed expectations. What distinguishes Ignacio is his engaging nature and relentless pursuit of learning. He approaches every task with humility and a strong work ethic, always striving to expand his knowledge and skills. His dedication ensures a seamless collaboration within the team. If you're seeking a developer committed to continual improvement and fostering teamwork, Ignacio is the ideal choice.

myRecomendations.name: Joseph Pisani
myRecomendations.role: IT Software Support | AV Technical Designer.
myRecomendations.description: Having worked with Ignacio for about a year I have seen his growth as a developer. He is someone who will go above and beyond, communicating very well with the team. He also is great at working with his peers in group coding sessions and ensuring there is consistency and quality in the code base. I would recommend him to someone looking to grow their development team.

myRecomendations.name: Zachary Roosen
myRecomendations.description: Ignacio is an exceptional Front-End Developer with a unique combination of technical experience, positive attitude and a strong work ethic. He is a highly motivated and results-oriented individual who consistently produces high-quality work. I have no doubt that Ignacio would be a valuable asset to his team, not only because of his technical skills but also because of his collaborative and helpful nature.

myRecomendations.name: Kiefer Aland
myRecomendations.description: I had the privilege of working with Ignacio at Pawtrics Software, where he demonstrated a strong aptitude for learning and applying React web development skills. Ignacio has an impressive understanding of web technologies and consistently sought to enhance his coding skill set. His proactive attitude and ability to contribute effectively made him a valuable team member. I highly recommend Ignacio to any team looking for a developer with a dedication to quality and growth.
